name: What Stars Still Remain
description:
Available here.

You are a God. Recently another god, who you were close to, passed away. Now you have to try and preserve the worlds they leave behind. You cannot save all of them, all you can do is try.

Note: If you click the 'download' button, a somewhat broken version of the page will come up. However, once you hit 'join session' the issue resolves itself.
